summary: This document is an email exchange between Audrey Strauss and another U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) prosecutor regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. It references a statement from an individual (likely Maxwell) describing her transition from being Jeffrey Epstein's employee to his romantic partner, with the work relationship lessening around 2002-2003.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the recipient of an email discussing the nature of Ghislaine Maxwell's relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, and she comments that a stated fact is helpful to their legal theory.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of Discussion / Former Associate of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses her statement that she was an employee of Jeffrey Epstein prior to becoming his romantic partner, and that her work for him lessened considerably around 2002-2003.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the individual for whom Ghislaine Maxwell worked and with whom she later had a romantic relationship.

connections.description: Maxwell states she started working for Epstein in 1992.
The nature of their relationship changed over time from work to a romantic partnership.

events.title: Maxwell begins working for Epstein
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell states she started working for Jeffrey Epstein at some point in 1992.

events.title: Change in Maxwell's work relationship with Epstein
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell states that her work for Jeffrey Epstein lessened considerably around 2002-2003, coinciding with the change in their relationship.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell stated she began working for Jeffrey Epstein in 1992.
Maxwell described the nature of her relationship with Epstein changing over time from employee to romantic partner.
Her work for Epstein 'lessened considerably' around 2002-2003.
Prosecutor Audrey Strauss noted this timeline was helpful to their legal theory.
The document is a 2019 email exchange between SDNY prosecutors discussing evidence relevant to the Maxwell case.
